main_topic.author: Roschild.Rui
main_topic.title: [question]9h time limit
main_topic.content:
Will the organizers rerun our submission on the test set, or will we receive a PV score as long as we successfully submit and have an LB score? 

I saw some situations that when the running time was out of 9 hours the notebook was still running and got a lb score

comments.author: Valentin Werner
comments.content: Private scores are already calculated during your submission. So if you got a LB score, your submission is fine.
comments.date: Posted 10 days ago  ·  38th in this Competition

comments.author: Rise_Hand
comments.content: Yes, thus we should be very careful to ensemble our models or make any post processing
comments.date: Posted 9 days ago  ·  28th in this Competition
